Commonwealth of Massachusetts - Department of Fish and Game
Effectiveness of Blaze Orange Safety Video
links.description: Hunters and other outdoor enthusiasts are encouraged to check out a new short (5-minute) video on the 'Effectiveness of Blaze Orange' from Kalkomey Enterprises. See some excellent footage demonstrating how wearing fluorescent orange in the woods makes you highly visible to others.
